channel.title: How do i add items to client?
channel.description:
how do i add items to a client because i have a source but the client dosent support an item i want
how do i make it so that item would be itself not a null please help.....
item is:
saradomin robes-guthix robes
also can someone post a good starter base?
im brand new to the client think althoguh no a little bit about editing a server :)
thank you moparsace !!!!!!!!!!!!!! --moparisthebest-- really it is lol
